stripped_text: Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn. Choose a Runner card type. Trash all installed non-icebreaker cards of the chosen type. For each card that would be trashed this way, the Runner may pay 3 credits to prevent that card from being trashed. Take 1 bad publicity.
text: Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn. Choose a Runner card type. Trash all installed non-icebreaker cards of the chosen type. For each card that would be trashed this way, the Runner may pay 3[credit] to prevent that card from being trashed. Take 1 bad publicity.
title: Game Over
